meta.title: Sales AI Agent Decision Tree — Option B
meta.description: Agent evaluates CHAMP signals. Hot + Warm → Calendly (tagged). Nurture → resources + re-qualify. DQ → polite close. Contact form used for knowledge gap escalation only.

step_1_greeting.name: GREETING
step_1_greeting.prompt: Hi — I'm here to help you figure out if an inbound Sales AI Agent could work for your business. Mind if I ask a few questions?
step_1_greeting.context: No broad Halo Lab pitch. Visitor already chose this page.

step_2_introduction.name: INTRODUCTION
topics: What an inbound Sales AI Agent is
What it does: qualify leads, book meetings, handle FAQs

step_3_discovery_company.name: DISCOVERY_COMPANY
prompts: Tell me about your company — what do you do?

fails.message: Thanks for reaching out — this isn't something we're able to help with.

step_4_discovery_use_case.name: DISCOVERY_USE_CASE
step_4_discovery_use_case.prompt: What are you looking for in a Sales AI Agent?
exploration_areas: What problem is driving this need

step_5_discovery_pain_points.name: DISCOVERY_PAIN_POINTS
step_5_discovery_pain_points.prompt: What's the biggest pain in your current sales process?
exploration_areas: Too slow to respond to leads

step_6_discovery_volume.name: DISCOVERY_VOLUME
prompts: How many leads per month does your website currently get?
What kind of conversation volume do you expect after launch?
step_6_discovery_volume.purpose: Critical for Botpress plan scoping and pricing

step_7_discovery_current_stack.name: DISCOVERY_CURRENT_STACK
step_7_discovery_current_stack.prompt: What sales tools do you use today?

step_8_discovery_timeline.name: DISCOVERY_TIMELINE
prompts: When are you hoping to have this live?
Is there a trigger event — product launch, funding round?

step_9_discovery_budget.name: DISCOVERY_BUDGET
prompts: What budget range are you working with for this project?
Who else is involved in the decision?

step_10_champ_scoring.name: INTERNAL CHAMP EVALUATION
step_10_champ_scoring.description: Agent evaluates all 4 CHAMP signals internally. Score is NEVER announced to the visitor. Language and next step naturally reflect the category.

CH.name: Challenges
CH.evaluation: Clear use case + specific pain articulated?
CH.rule: Without this confirmed → max outcome = Nurture

WARM.description: Challenges confirmed + at least 1 of Authority/Money/Prioritization confirmed

NURTURE.description: Challenges weak/vague, or CH confirmed but all 3 of A/M/P missing. Exploring options.
NURTURE.alternate_criteria: CH confirmed + all 3 of A/M/P missing

DQ_CHAMP.criteria: No relevant need, wrong scope, no sales team, spam, or ICP exclusion
triggers: No relevant need (visitor has no sales challenge)
No sales team (no one to augment)

HOT.message: This sounds like a great fit. I'd love to get you on a call with our team — here's a link to book a time.
actions: Tag as HOT in Botpress Table

WARM.message: There's definitely something to explore here. Let me get you connected with our team — here's a link to book a call.
actions: Tag as WARM in Botpress Table
Sales team prepares for missing signals (budget objection, etc.)

NURTURE.note: Can upgrade to Warm or Hot if signals improve

DQ.message: Thanks for reaching out — based on what you've described, this service may not be the right fit right now.

knowledge_gap.trigger: Knowledge gap at any category, any point
knowledge_gap.action: Offer contact form. Agent continues. Calendly still offered at end.

visitor_declines_calendly.trigger: Visitor declines Calendly (Hot or Warm leads)
visitor_declines_calendly.response: No problem — I can have someone reach out. Can I take your details?

nurture_flow.trigger: Agent knows this is a Nurture lead from CHAMP scoring. Frames check-in with more intent to upgrade.

n1_share_resources.name: SHARE RESOURCES
n1_share_resources.prompt: Let me share a couple of examples of what we've built — these should give you a clearer sense of what's possible.
n1_share_resources.action: Share case studies. Agent notes visitor's reaction.

n2_check_in.name: CHECK IN
n2_check_in.prompt: Did any of those feel close to what you're thinking about?
n2_check_in.purpose: Agent uses response to refine understanding of Challenges.

n3_re_qualification.name: RE-QUALIFICATION
n3_re_qualification.prompt: What would need to change on your side for this to become something you'd want to move forward on?
n3_re_qualification.purpose: Surfaces blockers. Agent re-evaluates CHAMP signals.

n4_soft_calendly_nudge.name: SOFT CALENDLY NUDGE
n4_soft_calendly_nudge.prompt: Even if it's just exploratory, a 20-min call might help clarify what's realistic.

n5_warm_close.name: WARM CLOSE
n5_warm_close.prompt: Totally understood — come back when the timing is better. I'll make a note so our team has context if you do reach out.

knowledge_gap_escalation.trigger: Visitor asks a question at any point in the flow

can_answer_partially.follow_up: Our team can give more detail on a call.

cannot_answer.response: That's a great question — I don't have enough detail. Let me capture your question so our team gets back to you.
cannot_answer.note: Agent continues the conversation. Qualification does not stop.

off_topic.response: That's interesting! Coming back to your Sales AI Agent project...

skip_discovery.trigger: Visitor says 'Can I just schedule a call?'
skip_discovery.response: Absolutely! Just a couple quick questions so our team can prepare the right approach for you.
skip_discovery.scoring_note: Agent scores with available data → Route accordingly. Likely Warm due to incomplete signals, but CH may be clear.

unresponsive.response: Still there? No rush — let me know when you're ready to continue, or I can have our team reach out.
unresponsive.action: Wait for response or offer contact form

icp_exclusion_step_3.action: Immediate polite close. No Calendly. No form.

triggers: No relevant need (visitor has no sales challenge)
No sales team (no one to augment)
champ_scoring_step_10.response: Thanks for reaching out — based on what you've described, this service may not be the right fit right now.
